attributes.action: public vote of no confidence in the government
attributes.additional_details: I believe that the country are owed a general election as we the public cannot take no more of this service the tory party are giving.
attributes.background: With this mornings news on Liz Truss getting 19k for the job she did while the rest of the country suffer with this cost of living crisis I believe it's time for the Tory party to go.
